## 1- LOading the Data

We take the URL of the data and put it on a local directory with  a copy on Github



```{r data}
# URL address of the data
URL <- "https://d396qusza40orc.cloudfront.net/repdata%2Fdata%2Factivity.zip"

# download the file 
download.file(URL,destfile="repdata_2Fdata_2Factivity.zip",method="auto")


# Unzip the file
unzip(zipfile="repdata_2Fdata_2Factivity.zip",exdir="data")
 

```

## Including Plots

You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
plot(pressure)
```

Note that the `echo = FALSE` parameter was added to the code chunk to prevent printing of the R code that generated the plot.
